mapper.select: SELECT BLTN_BRD_M_SQN, BLTN_BRD_D_SQN, BLTN_BRD_D_TYP, BLTN_BRD_D_NM, BLTN_BRD_D_CNT, BLTN_BRD_D_TOP_SQN, BLTN_BRD_D_UPR_SQN, SQN, DEL_YN, STEP, ATFL_SQN, FSR_REG_DTM, FSR_REG_USR_ID, LST_MDF_DTM, LST_MDF_USR_ID FROM TB_BC_BLTN_BRD_D WHERE BLTN_BRD_M_SQN = 1 AND BLTN_BRD_D_SQN = 1

SELECT BLTN_BRD_M_SQN, BLTN_BRD_D_SQN, BLTN_BRD_D_TYP, BLTN_BRD_D_NM, BLTN_BRD_D_CNT, BLTN_BRD_D_TOP_SQN, BLTN_BRD_D_UPR_SQN, SQN, DEL_YN, STEP, ATFL_SQN, FSR_REG_DTM, FSR_REG_USR_ID, LST_MDF_DTM, LST_MDF_USR_ID FROM TB_BC_BLTN_BRD_D WHERE BLTN_BRD_M_SQN = 1 AND BLTN_BRD_D_SQN = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BC_BLTN_BRD_D (BLTN_BRD_M_SQN, BLTN_BRD_D_SQN, BLTN_BRD_D_TYP, BLTN_BRD_D_NM, BLTN_BRD_D_CNT, BLTN_BRD_D_TOP_SQN, BLTN_BRD_D_UPR_SQN, SQN, DEL_YN, STEP, ATFL_SQN, FSR_REG_DTM, FSR_REG_USR_ID, LST_MDF_DTM, LST_MDF_USR_ID) VALUES (1, 1, 'N', 'BLTN_BRD_D_NM 1', 'BLTN_BRD_D_CNT 1', 1, 1, 1, 'N', 1, 'ATFL_SQN 1', NOW(), 'FSR_REG_USR_ID 1', NOW(), 'LST_MDF_USR_ID 1')
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BC_BLTN_BRD_D SET BLTN_BRD_M_SQN = 1, BLTN_BRD_D_SQN = 1, BLTN_BRD_D_TYP = 'N', BLTN_BRD_D_NM = 'BLTN_BRD_D_NM 1', BLTN_BRD_D_CNT = 'BLTN_BRD_D_CNT 1', BLTN_BRD_D_TOP_SQN = 1, BLTN_BRD_D_UPR_SQN = 1, SQN = 1, DEL_YN = 'N', STEP = 1, ATFL_SQN = 'ATFL_SQN 1', FSR_REG_DTM = NOW(), FSR_REG_USR_ID = 'FSR_REG_USR_ID 1', LST_MDF_DTM = NOW(), LST_MDF_USR_ID = 'LST_MDF_USR_ID 1' WHERE BLTN_BRD_M_SQN = 1 AND BLTN_BRD_D_SQN = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_BC_BLTN_BRD_D WHERE BLTN_BRD_M_SQN = 1 AND BLTN_BRD_D_SQN = 1
